text:
="preserve">Dorothy Joanne Cook (later Joanna Moore; November 10, 1934 – November 22, 1997) was an American movie and television actress. She appeared in more than eighty roles. She played Penny in "Appointment with a Shadow". She also acted in the 1959 TV series "The Untouchables".
Moore was born in Parrott, Georgia. She died because of lung cancer in Indian Wells, California.
